function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Promote a shift in academic culture towards valuing quality over quantity, support long-term research projects, and provide recognition for in-depth scholarship","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Encourage critical evaluation of scholarly sources, promote interdisciplinary collaboration, and support mechanisms for amplifying underrepresented voices","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Recognition of likely biases and prioritization of research on marginalized research areas","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Informed choice-making and prioritization of research coverage to match real-world problems","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Collecting and reporting additional contextual data, reviewing research design elements to ensure robustness to pandemic-related impacts","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement flexible and adaptable research approaches, collaborate with diverse stakeholders, and prioritize transparency in research practices.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Publish updates and adapt recommendations to changing circumstances, prioritize short-term applicability, and maintain open communication with stakeholders.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Promote the integration of social science in energy research, advocate for transparent and contextually aware research practices, and support education and training in research ethics and transparency.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Combine multiple interventions to have a substantial impact on transmission, implementing a range of non-pharmaceutical interventions npis to reduce contact rates in the population.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Combine home isolation of suspect cases, home quarantine of those living with suspect cases, and social distancing of the elderly and high-risk individuals to mitigate peak healthcare demand and reduce deaths. consider implementing suppression strategies if possible.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing effective social distancing measures and maintaining them until a vaccine becomes available","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing alternative education and support systems for students and families","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures, research and development of sustainable solutions","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sustained implementation of controls and interventions even after initial success.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Investment in research and development of effective vaccines and treatments for prolonged use.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Targeted vaccination of at-risk individuals and continuous monitoring of population immunity.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continued research and data collection","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Public education and clear communication","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Targeted financial support and social welfare measures","category":"Quarantine support / Social activities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use additional data sources for contact points outside of high population density areas","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement testing and quarantine protocols based on updated incubation period research","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Expanded testing and monitoring, inclusion of asymptomatic cases in data collection","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous monitoring and research on immunity duration and re-infection risks","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement measures to reduce the spread of the disease and prevent hospitalization","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous monitoring and updating of ifr estimates based on evolving data","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of control measures, behavior changes","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Timely decision making, rapid response","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Regular reassessment of assumptions, flexible response strategies","category":"Early detection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing mitigation measures to reduce the impact of the epidemic","category":"Preventive Measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increasing critical care bed capacity, implementing triage protocols, and optimizing resource allocation","category":"Preventive Measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Focus on other high-impact interventions, communicate importance of home, school, and workplace precautions","category":"Preventive Measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement suppression measures, increase healthcare capacity, prioritize high-risk groups for care","category":"Preventive Measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement early triggers for social distancing policies","category":"Preventive Measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous monitoring and updating of r0 and severity data","category":"Preventive Measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement support systems for mental health and economic relief programs","category":"Quarantine support / Social activities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Clear communication, support networks, and incentives for compliance.","category":"Quarantine support / Social activities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Education and support for effective home isolation, provision of resources for remote learning, and monitoring of compliance.","category":"Quarantine support / Social activities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Invest in research and development for rapid vaccine production","category":"Preventive Measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Invest in ongoing surveillance and research to inform policy decisions","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement public awareness campaigns and education programs","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continual assessment and adaptation of suppression measures to maintain effectiveness","category":"Preventive Measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Addressing privacy concerns through transparent data usage policies, encryption, and user consent","category":"Preventive Measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continual enforcement of npi measures, public health education and awareness campaigns","category":"Preventive Measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing other complementary strategies along with school closure","category":"Preventive Measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developing clear guidelines for the timing of interventions based on the nature of the epidemic","category":"Preventive Measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementing more rapid testing and surveillance systems","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implementation of support systems for affected individuals and businesses, economic stimulus packages","category":"Quarantine support / Social activities","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous monitoring and adaptation of suppression measures, research for new intervention methods","category":"Preventive Measures","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting separate analyses for each country to account for variations in the impact of interventions on transmission rates.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporating data from countries with a range of epidemic stages and intervention timings to capture a broader picture of intervention impact.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium"}]}
